sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; const Checkout = ({ order, user }) => { const { items, shipping_charge, discount_in_percent, shipping_address, totalCost, totalItems } = order; const dispatch = useDispatch(); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ firstName: '', lastName: '', phone: '', address1: '', address2: '', country: '', state: '', zip: '', }); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value, }) } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); dispatch({ type: 'ADD_ADDRESS', payload: formData, }) } return (

Checkout

{items.length}

  • Total
    ${totalCost}
  • Items
    {totalItems}
  • Shipping Charges
    ${shipping_charge}
  • Discount({discount_in_percent}%)
    -{totalCost * discount_in_percent / 100}
  • Total (USD) ${totalCost - totalCost * discount_in_percent / 100 + shipping_charge}

Shipping address

{ user.address.map((user) =>
{user.first_name} {user.last_name}
{user.address1}, {user.address2}, {user.state}, {user.pincode}

{user.phone}

Use this Address
) }
OR

Add New Address

Valid first name is required.
Valid last name is required.
Please enter a valid phone for shipping updates.
Please enter your shipping address.
Please select a valid country.
Please provide a valid state.
Zip code required.
) } export default Checkout
